version_description:
1- Outstanding daily rewards
2- Enhanced In game projects appearance
3- New tab for promo codes
4- VIP game holder image changes based on game entry fee
5- General enhancements
بعض الاصلاحات التقنية

-شارك في الدردشة العامة الجديدة كلياً!
-إضافة إمكانية إيقاف صوت المعلق
-تحسينات على شكل و سهولة التنقل داخل اللعبة
-إصلاحات عامة

-شارك أصحابك و تعرف على لاعبين جدد في المنتدى الجديد داخل اللعبة!
-اصلاحات عامة

- اضافة امكانية الدخول الى الدردشة العامة من اي لائحة فاللعبة
- اصلاحات عامة

- بإمكانك إضافة طابعك الشخصي بتغيير شكل الورق وطاولة اللعب والدردشة
- بعض الإصلاحات التقنية

•جواهر يومية إضافية
•جواهر أكثر عند التسجيل
•يمكنك الآن إرسال دعوة لأصدقائك لمشاركتك في الجلسات الخاصة
•أصبحت خاصية سوا متاحة في جميع الجلسات
•مشاركة المواضيع في الشات العام
•إضافة صور في ألبوم الملف الشخصي
•إمكانية رفع صورة شخصية مباشرةً من ألبوم الجهاز
•إصلاحات وتحسينات عامة
Bug fixes and optimizations

- Leagues
- Disable sounds while playing
- Banned players wont be able to join the VIP room created by you
- General fixes and improvements
General enhancements and improvements

- Added prizes to league tab
- Fixed score display in leaderboards
- General UI enhancements and fixes

- Spectator mode
- Donate (diamonds, rubies, VIP) to other players
- Access player profile while in-game
- General enhancements and bug fixes

1- Outstanding daily rewards
2- Enhanced In game projects appearance
3- New tab for promo codes
4- VIP game holder image changes based on game entry fee
5- General enhancements

- Change username can be accessed in personal profile
- Store redesign
- Replace Music/Sound/Narrator sound toggles with sliders

-New VIP Events.
-Card Colors Changes and additions.
-Fixing some Arabic terms inside game.
-Modification to App Store Screenshots.
-Changes to English name of the App

- Compete with your friends by having high levels of VIP in the leaderboards
- Feel extra special with the new VIP border and badge in the public chat
- Clarifying banners counter by adding minutes and seconds
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- New leaderboard that holds the VIP, likes, experience and leagues rankings
- Google account registration and login
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- You can now customize chat order from the settings.

- Ramadan Cards and table background: available on April 21
- Leaderboard rearrangement and new design.
- Technical fixes.

"VIP game invite" and "Share topic" pop-ups now show online/offline friends.
List of online and offline friends under “player search” screen
New tabs under “Profile” screen
Trophies system
Badge notification for new messages in private conversations
Redesign of the pop-up for VIP game creation.
"Clear all" button for notifications.
VIP subscriptions Auto-renewal (soon)

- Clubs - Create or join clubs and customize its name, badge, and description. Club private chat allows you to chat with other players in the same club.
- Club rankings - Compete with other clubs by winning more games and collecting fame points.

Personal achievements
Club achievements
New club frames

Club duels feature - clubs compete against each other in completing various objectives.
Toast notifications - a new way for players to be informed when they perform various action within the game.
Animated emotes - all emotes are now animated!

Club customization.
Player club invite via profile.
Player commend.
Bug fixes and enhancements
